# sizeThatFits(_:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the control to calculate and return the size that best fits the specified size.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func sizeThatFits(_ size: NSSize) -> NSSize
```

## Parameters

- **size**: The size for which the control should calculate its best-fitting size.

## Return Value

A new size that fits the receiver’s subviews.

## Discussion

By default, this method returns the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/intrinsicContentSize] of the receiver.

## Resizing the Control

- **controlSize**: The size of the control.
- **NSControl.ControlSize**: A constant for specifying a cell’s size.
- **sizeToFit()**: Resizes the receiver’s frame so that it’s the minimum size needed to contain its cell.
